name: 破阵图(Grids of World)
description:
The game based on the principle of Tic-Tac-Toe.
In order to win, the player needs three consecutive strongholds to form a line.
The game uses UE4 engine for next generation rendering. Players can currently experience two-player battles. Four players will play in random teams.

[Attention]
In Game Demo,You can press Ctrl+Alt+Enter to shift game from window mode to full screen mode,that may better your gameplay.

[Gameplay]
The game implements no small map mode. Players need to judge their own position in the game by the corresponding position of the stronghold.
Kill all the Guardian AIs before attacking the Guardian building. Otherwise, the attack is invalid. Once the stronghold is captured, the stronghold will be prompted on the UI interface in the upper right corner of the player.
The distribution of points is not approximately equal to the point UI. When the stronghold UI shows that the strongholds occupied by a certain team of players is three consecutive strongholds in a line,determine the team's victory.

[Some notes]
Individually developed. The trial version is just a demo that completes the basic process. The purpose of the launch is to find out the existing basic structure and problems of the game.
The offcial version will provide multi language support including English.
The official version will undergo big changes including fine arts such as model actions.
The official version will optimize at least the following: better ai system. Item system and weapon replacement system. Hierarchical stronghold system. Multi-role system.
